Well stocked with cooking and eating equipment. The bed is one of those adjustable beds which I’m considering buying now and it was much homier than a hotel room. She really pays attention to the little things.Had a small cut on my finger that was bleeding everywhere. Med kit I have in my truck is good for patching bullet holes or missing limbs but I didn’t have a small bandage. Looked under the sink for something to clean up blood and found a first aid kit. Saved me a trip to the pharmacy. Won’t find that at a hotel!
I absolutely loved my stay here! Denisse was so kind, and it felt like home away from home. I can’t wait to come back, my boyfriend and I loved it!

This was a perfect little spot for our trip Yuma! Denisse was great to work with, always responded quickly! Such a nice casita to relax in and feel at home! I highly recommend booking with Denisse.

My husband and I were so happy with this lovely and private casita in central Yuma. We are definitely hoping to return! All the little touches and friendly messages that show Denisse really cares. Thank you.

Well thought out studio design. Loved my stay

Quiet neighborhood. I liked the ability to pull up to the front door and close the driveway gate behind. I would definitely stay there again.
What a lovely place — perfect in every way. If life takes you to Yuma, as mine briefly did, this is the place: conveniently located and well-appointed, it felt like an oasis. Thank you, Denisse!
This AirBNB was so nice! Very clean & well kept! Would recommend and definitely stay again!
It's a charmingly modern home. Very beautiful, warm, and has every essentials that you need for your stay.

My husband and I visited Yuma for close access to Los Algodoñes. Denisse's home was a 20 minute drive away, which was incredibly convenient. The home was intimate, and perfect for a short stay. The home had everything we needed, a clean bathroom, nice shower, big closet, comfortable bed, and kitchen full of amenities. This home has an automatic gate to close off the front porch for added privacy and security as well. It was located in the nice part of town, right down the street from coffee and grocery stores. I would highly recommend this home for your trip to Yuma.

Very pleasant stay! Lovely! The house is clean, new and tidy! Highly recommended and will definitely stay here again if i were to travel to yuma :) thanks for the experience!
Immaculate, beautiful and cozy home! Just enough space with everything you need, located in the middle of town and very private. Super clean, upgraded kitchen. Would definitely stay again!

This was the perfect little place for our weekend stay-cation. A peaceful and fresh atmosphere, cozy bed, and no-stress tiny house. Denisse was attentive and kind. We’re already talking about staying there again. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Great place perfect for a party of 2! Denisse was an awesome host with great communication. Our stay was peaceful and the home was just as described in the listing.
Denise’s place was cozy, spotless, and convenient. All of her places are very well-maintained and appointed. Will be back!!
Such a cute space and perfect for a weekend visit. Had everything we needed and was very private. Will definitely be staying here again if scheduling allows in the future!

Can’t say enough about this charming small home. Denisse has created such a lovely refuge. Thoughtful touches throughout. Pristine, spotless and beautifully decorated. I felt so at home here and Denisse’s flexibility around early check in and late check out only added to the quality of my stay. Outstanding location; market and Starbucks minutes away. Woke up early enough to enjoy coffee on the tiny patio before the heat descended. Just a lovely spot. Highly recommend.
Clean and comfortable. Exactly as described and portrayed in the photos. Thank you for a great stay!
Absolutely loved the space! I have an Airbnb and I’m in the process of starting more and I’m definitely taking some ideas with me! Thank you so much Denisse for the stay! May God bless you!

Accurate to the photos and descriptions. The space is well equipped and cozy. The space is small but has everything you need. It is a guest house but very private with a fence that separates the guest house from the main house and a completely separate entrance and parking. The host had good communication and was responsive to messages. The location is central, easy to get around town from here.

Denisse’s guest home was perfect for us! My wife and I were traveling with our 6mos old daughter. The studio apartment was perfect and she had a pack and play available for our use! The home is located next to great local spots to eat (Jector’s, MarAzul, Dutch Bros, and Sprouts Supermarket). We loved having a space to come back to to escape the heat. There was a private gate and parking which was awesome. Denisse was very responsive and helpful—Definitely recommend staying at Denisse’s!

Denisse's place is perfect. It's quiet and clean; well-decorated and the kitchen is well-stocked as well. It's location makes it super easy to get around Yuma easily. -lot's of thoughtful details at the Airbnb.

Our stay was wonderful! We felt right at home as soon as we got there. The place was clean and organized. The little side yard was so nice for the pups to play around. Grateful to have found this place! We’d most definitely book again next time we come out to sunny yuma!
Loved the small apartment. It was perfect for a small stay. There was a small issue but overall Denisse was willing to fix it immediately. Great place to stay. Definitely would do it again.
It was a please staying in Stephanie’s place. I would definitely stay here again.

Hands down nicest place to stay in Yuma! Denisse has thought of everything a guest would need. The newly built guest unit is well designed with great lighting, quality fixtures, a well stocked kitchen, and soft linens. Much nicer than comparably priced hotels in the area. Also centrally located and a Sprouts market a few streets away. Highly recommend it!

The place was in excellent condition.
Very well located with great restaurants and parks close by.
It was comfortable, clean and very well kept.
Ver cozy and well put together. Would go back again.

I stayed here 4 nights for work, and I really enjoyed it! It's super cute: nice lighting options both on the outside and inside of the place, and loved the color scheme of the kitchen and bathroom. Super close to Sprout's and Starbucks. (If you're looking for a local coffee shop, you have to check out Cafecito, located in historic downtown.)
Pro tip: When using the remote for the AC system, click on "turbo" to get the place cooled down quickly, and click the LED button to turn the light on the AC off so you can sleep at night.
Absolutely loved this little Airbnb and will plan on staying here next time we’re in town!

super clean, very modern, fully equipped. totally recommend

Very accommodating host and the place was amazingggg!! Exactly as the photos showed and close to yuma palms which was ideal. Has a great stay :)

One of the best airbnb's I've stayed in over 10 years! Great floor plan, nice touches in furniture, lighting, private, secure yard. Hosts are professional and responsive. Yuma's #1 airbnb!
Thanks Denisse!

The photos and descriptions of this modern and clean guest house were beautiful and reviews were good also. We were surprised that the sofa is a sofa bed and missed that in the description but our host was kind to explain that they soon will replace this with a queen bed. All the appliances, television, wi fi and shower were clean and the house is welcoming. The host is awesome with communication also. We did not like the sofa bed with the thin mattress and it was extremely uncomfortable but they will soon replace it. I’m sure the neighborhood is safe enough and I liked that we had a gate ….we are not familiar with Yuma and the sirens and beware of dog signs were a bit concerning but this property was well lit and good gates and lighting. Also, good locks and felt safe within the guest house. Overall, a quaint place with good decor, nice appliances and wonderful host.
Beautiful place, easy check-in, everything provided as listed. 5 star stay.
Check in was exactly as described. The place is clean and feels safe. Denisse responds very quickly to messages. And went above and beyond to mail back some things I had left there accidentally.

Denisse was great at providing instructions to get in, check out, and would check in with us throughout our stay. We took our pup with us and they loved the little yard and would go out and sun bath and with the gate it was nice to let her be outside without her running off. The place was well lit at night making it super easy to get in and out. We will definitely be coming back to stay!

What a great find! My husband and I stayed here during our annual family trip to the sand dunes which we drove to 30 min there and back each day. We have 2 kiddos under two and one slept in a pack n play in a closet, and the other in a pack n play in the kitchen. It was a quaint, small, and gorgeous place. The hosts were amazing. They got us one pack n play so we only had to bring one, and at one point during the trip the electric gate opener ran out of batteries so they drive right over to give us another one. I love how much privacy there was and it even had a little grass lawn which was great for our toddler to run around in. 10/10 place, you won’t regret staying here!
Great place to relax, Casita is so well put together.
Great little place! Perfect for a weekend or a long stay.
Everything was great!

Kitchen is very spacious and well stocked with pots and pans and cooking utensils. Laundry is included, the only thing is that it is shared with adjacent units, but we didn’t encounter any issues. Would definitely recommend this stay!
A great place to stay. Roomy, comfortable, and reasonably priced!

Cathy is a wonderful host. She is very rapid with her responses to questions. The location is perfect for me because when I stay in Yuma I am visiting my dentist in Los Algadones. This was my second stay here and I will stay here again. Was able to enjoy walking around the Wetlands Park this visit and it is a plus.
Wonderful host very private stay with ample space to relax after work.
Great value - spacious apartment (for 1 or 2 people) in a convenient location and has everything you need. Fast communication from the owner and all instructions are laid out well.

Very clean and nice place. If you’ve forgotten to bring certain items like, shampoo, conditioner, body wash or even detergent it is all provided there for you! It is also a very quiet area and has a nice outside lounge with lights where you can also relax. And the hosts answer almost immediately when you text them.
Apartment is very clean & exactly what we needed for our hunting trip. Pool needed TLC.

This unit was great! Plenty of dishes and pots and pans and cooking utensils for whatever I needed. It was clean and surprisingly roomy. Never got a chance to use the pool but it was there and accessible. Highly recommended.
This is an awesome location, right next to the Park and river. Spacious ad clean.

I’ve been in this house and have hosted with cathy 3 times and she is AMAZING! So worth the money and the place is adorable! We stay here as often as we can. So close to downtown Yuma and right next to the park. Cathy is an amazing host and is excellent with communication. 1000 percent recommend.

It was clean as advertised. And the location was really fun easy to get to the interstate the grocery or to the old down town. We spent most of our time at the state parks Picacho, senator’s Wash, lake Mittry, and even floated down 2.5 miles of the Colorado. It is a multi family unit. I would highly recommend staying at this location. If you like conservation the West Wetlands Park and a bike path are around the corner. Close to Historic Downtown Yuma. Our hosts were very responsive to any questions or problems. Felt safe and place was very clean. Nice small apartment with all amenties listed. Would definately stay there again!!

Can understand why Cathy is a super host. My experience was a great one. Place was as advertised. If you like to walk like I do, this place is for you. You are literally just steps away from miles of trails through parks and wetlands.

Cathy’s home is so incredibly warm and welcoming. This is the second time we have stayed here and she is very quick to respond and is always so helpful! We have walked to downtown Yuma from here and went to go see the ducks at the park:) you get so much and the hosts are amazing! I would recommend to anyone. Thank you cathy!
Very nice space , very professional and comfortable!!!!
Wonderful spot in Yuma! Super easy to get to and had easy access to everything in town. The furnished apartment had everything we needed for our short stay. Thanks again!

Great place for my stay and met all my needs! Perfect location and they were extremely attentive when needed.

Great place for any baseball parent looking for an alternative to the hotels to have a little more space. (It's a 1 bedroom apartment with a living room, full kitchen and dinette table) This location is 11 minutes max from all of the youth and high school baseball fields, is near a Chevron with every flavor of sunflower seeds, plus plenty of restaurants. The place comes completely stocked with the essentials such as bath linens, bath soap, shampoo, and even laundry supplies as there is a washer and dryer available. Location is very quiet and easy to find. Owners are very responsive as well! (We didn't have time between the games to enjoy the pool or the surrounding park area, but maybe next time!)

This is the second home of Cathy’s that I’ve stayed in and I had just as amazing of a time this trip as I did the last. Her home was super clean and very cute. She definitely always does her best to make sure we feel at home and comfortable. My SO and I are from Yuma and visit all the time so we will definitely always be choosing one of Cathy’s homes every time!

This place is so comfortable from the bed, bath, living room and I felt so at home. Cathy greeted me with such sweet kindness and made me feel at home. I loved sitting in the rocking chair after a morning of dental work and watching movies. The kitchen had everything I needed to cook my own food but the restaurants were very close. Will have to return soon for my dental work so I hope I will be able to stay here again.
Great place! Definitely recommend. Its clean, peaceful, and spacious.

This place was perfect for my husband and I. We were in town for a baseball tournament, games were at PAAC and it only took us about 5 min to get the field. Cute and clean little apartment. Would definitely stay there again if we come back to Yuma.

She gives you a brief tour/overview after your arrival, so you know where everything is, where to place your food items in the refrigerator, and which rooms in her home have other Airbnb guests. There is a lock on both the "Joy" bedroom door and the shared bathroom door. Maria creates an individual code for you to gain entrance to her home.
Two male guests were staying in the other rooms, and I shared a bathroom with one of them who was booked in the "Hope" room. There was no issue with timing, as our schedules turned out to be quite different (mine was arising early and early to bed and he was a late arrival, later to arise). I am not irritated by the noise of an across-the-hall neighbor arriving while I'm sleeping and using the adjacent shared bathroom to prepare for bed. If you are someone who is (i.e. you struggle to return to sleep once awakened), I would recommend you book the room that has its own private bath, as it is located down the hall from the two that share a bathroom (the "joy" and "hope" bedrooms.
I will be returning to Yuma in January of 2023, and if Maria has availability in her home at that time, I would not hesitate to book the "Joy" room again, as she is a welcoming and lovely Superhost who makes you feel welcome in her home without being in any way intrusive.
Highly recommended.
Travel Tips: Maria's home is within walking distance of a nearby major grocery store and nail salon. If you enjoy Mexican food, I can recommend the Mi Hefitas enchiladas from Duron's El Zarape grill. Five days later, I'm still thinking about them. I was raised on Mexican food in Texas and SoCal, but I've never had anything like them before. On an extremely hot day, you can find refreshingly cool treats at Raspados Penguino. I had the very sweet (and rather seedy) raspado de guayaba (guava), but you get the flavor you prefer. They also have Thrifty ice cream flavors and other sweet treats, and even nachos.
I found the best fuel prices in Yuma to be at any of the Arco stations, as long as you pay cash. If you happen to be driving from/through Phoenix on your way to Yuma, and you are a Costco member, you will not find a lower price on fuel in AZ than the Costco there, so if there is no line, fill up your tank there. I did not drive across the US-Mexico Andrade-Los Algodones border, but if you are, it might be worth your while to fill up on fuel over there, depending on how busy the border crossing is when you are visiting. In the last week of August, there were few cars making the crossing (again, due to the extreme heat that is common in late August), so the wait to drive through customs was brief, and there was no wait walking across or coming back through customs on foot. I hear this is *not* the case during the much busier winter months, when all the snowbirds are in town, so just something to keep in mind.
In closing, I highly recommend Maria's very clean, safe, conveniently located, well-appointed, and comfortable home.
